name: Bone

topics.response_text: Look scab, you don't want my attention.{Laughs like a jackal at his own jokes.}

description:
Bone is a 32 year-old Caucasian Female.

Bone is a female Pitt raider who watches over the slaves in the Mill. She can be found leaning against the wall opposite the entrance to the office that leads to the steelyard. Unlike many of her fellow raiders, Bone maintains a certain level of professionalism in her duties. Her weathered face shows the harshness of life in the Pitt, but her eyes betray a calculating intelligence.

Bone's Personality: Pragmatic and observant, Bone is less openly vicious than other Pitt raiders. She values strength and capability in others and can engage in civil conversation with those who prove themselves worthy in the Arena. Despite her role as a slaver, she doesn't take unnecessary pleasure in others' suffering, focusing instead on efficiency and order.

Bone's Backstory: Bone arrived at the Pitt several years ago, seeking refuge from the harsh wastelands. Unlike many who come to the Pitt, she didn't try to immediately challenge Ashur for control. Instead, she proved her worth through her organizational skills and ruthless efficiency in managing the slaves. Over time, she earned a position of authority in the Mill, becoming one of the few raiders Ashur trusts to maintain order without excessive brutality. She has grown comfortable in her role, seeing it as a necessary evil in the harsh reality of the wasteland.
